attributes.action: CHINAS INVASION OF TIBET, TRADE AND THE OLYMPICS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE INVADED KUWAIT TO EJECT THE ILLEGAL INVASION OF IRAQ INTO A NEIGHBOURING COUNTRY.
WE HAVE DONE NOTHING TO TAKE THE SAME STEPS AGAINST CHINA FOR THERE ILLEGAL INVASION OF TIBET, THE WORLD HAS DESERTED THE COUNTRY.
WE NEED TO SHOW THE CHINEES GOVERMENT THEY CAN NOT BEHAVE IN  THIS WAY.
THE BEST AND MOST EFFECTIVE WAY TO DO THIS, IS TO BAN PARTICIPATION IN THE OLYMPICS BY OUR COUNTRY.
AND TO BAN ALL IMPORTS OF CHINEES GOODS UNTILL THEY REMOVE THERE INVASION FORCES AND PEOPLE FROM TIBET AND RETURN THE LEGAL GOVERMENT TO IT OWN COUNTRY.

THEY ARE NOT ALLOWED UNDER INTERNATIONAL LAW TO DO THIS WE, AND THE OTHER MEMBERS OF THE UNITED NATIONS NEED TO TAKE THESE STEPS, IMMEDIATLY.
THE PEOPLE OF TIBET DESERVE OUR HELP AND SUPPORT..

NOW

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
